Class ListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • box.DialogBoxElement
      • box.ListBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ListBox
extends DialogBoxElement
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A class representing the list box of the dialogbox.

    Afraz Salim
